solution_line_template: The number of paintings Philip will make after {num_days} days is {paintings_per_day} paints/day * {num_days} days = <<{paintings_per_day}*{num_days}={paintings_made_in_days}>>{paintings_made_in_days} paintings.

Then, the total number of his paintings will be {paintings_made_in_days} paintings + {initial_paintings} paintings = <<{paintings_made_in_days}+{initial_paintings}={total_paintings}>>{total_paintings} paintings.
